devdoc.author: blOX Consulting LLC. Date: 6.17.19 Interface for main TandaPay service Factory contract for groups CRON/ Admin functionality*

addAdmin(address).details: modifier onlyAdmin Add an adminadd timelock*

createGroup(address,uint8).details: modifier isAdminmodifier validPremiumconstruct new Group(_to, _premium) Approve a secretary and create a new group

params._premium: the premium paid in Dai by all policyholders
params._to: the address being given a secretary role

createGroup(address,uint8).return: _group the address of the Group contact*

installSecretary(address,address).details: modifier isAdminonly if group's construction Secretary was removed Give a group a new secretary

params._group: the address of the Group contract*
params._secretary: the address being given the role of Secretary

loan(address).details: modifier onlyAdmin Extend a loan, in Dai, to a Tanda Grouprequire sufficienct balance

params._group: the group being given the loan

processAll().details: modifier onlyAdmin Remit all groups available to be remittedgas-heavy failsafe, processAll should be done 'manually' by web3*

remitGroup(address).details: modifier onlyAdminmodifier unlocked Remit a single group assuming it is not timelocked

params._group: the address of the group being remitted*

removeAdmin(address).details: modifier onlyAdmin Remove an adminadd timelock*

removeSecretary(address).details: modifier onlyAdmin Remove secretaryOwnership of Tanda group assigned to this contract*

params._from: the address being revoked the secretary role
